mixed list
tests.code:
it('mixed list', function () { const editor = this.initialize(Editor, `
  1. One
  2. Two
  3. Foo
  4. Bar
`); expect(editor.getHTML(2, 12)).toEqualHTML(`
  1. e
  2. Two
  • Foo
  • Ba
`); });

tests.name: nested list
tests.code:
it('nested list', function () { const editor = this.initialize(Editor, `
  1. One
  2. Two
  3. Alpha
  4. I
  5. II
  6. Three
`); expect(editor.getHTML(2, 20)).toEqualHTML(`
  1. e
  2. Two
    • Alpha
      1. I
      2. II
  3. Thr
`); });

tests.name: nested checklist
tests.code:
it('nested checklist', function () { const editor = this.initialize(Editor, `
  1. One
  2. Two
  3. Alpha
  4. I
  5. II
  6. Three
`); expect(editor.getHTML(2, 20)).toEqualHTML(`
  • e
  • Two
    • Alpha
      • I
      • II
  • Thr
`); });

tests.name: partial list
tests.code:
it('partial list', function () { const editor = this.initialize(Editor, `
  1. 1111
  2. AAAA
  3. IIII
  4. BBBB
  5. 2222
`); expect(editor.getHTML(12, 12)).toEqualHTML(`
      1. II
    2. BBBB
  2. 2222
`); });

xit('group and split multiple rows', function () { const editor = this.initialize(Editor, `

tests.name: balance cells
tests.code:
it('balance cells', function () { const editor = this.initialize(Editor, `
A1
B1 B2
C1 C2 C3
`); editor.scroll.children.head.balanceCells(); expect(this.container).toEqualHTML(`
A1

B1 B2
C1 C2 C3
`); });
